# Carrots

wash and peel 5-6 carrots

chop into pieces (about 5 inches long)

In pressure cooker, combine

* carrots
* 1 can (14 oz) of chicken broth
* 1 tbsp honey or maple syrup

Cook on HIGH for one minute (i.e. just soften the carrots slightly), and then quick release
